person.persName: Samuel Thomas (Hamilton County, Ohio, deputy sheriff)

body.p: Hamilton County, Ohio, deputy sheriff. Pennsylvania native. Son of Francis Thomas and Margaret Thomas. Married to Caroline Thomas. Father of Frank Thomas, Margaret Thomas, John Thomas, Samuel James Thomas, and Mary Ann Thomas. Watchman in Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1850. Deputy sheriff in Hamilton County in 1860.
